pages.title: Persistent Memory
pages.text: Your companion can remember facts between conversations.$(br2)$(bold)How to use$(br)Just tell the companion naturally:$(br)$(li)"Remember that my base is at 100, 64, 200"$(li)"What do you know about my base?"$(li)"Forget where my base is"$(br2)The companion stores up to $(bold)100 key-value facts$() and keeps an $(bold)event log$() of the last 50 significant events.

pages.title: Memory Details
pages.text: Memory operations:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Remember$() — Store a fact (key → value)$(li)$(bold)Recall$() — Look up a specific memory$(li)$(bold)Forget$() — Delete a memory$(li)$(bold)List All$() — View all stored memories$(li)$(bold)Log Event$() — Record a timestamped event$(br2)Memories persist via NBT — they survive game restarts and deaths. The AI automatically decides when to store or recall information.
